remarks: An entry of a matrix for a minor.  (Contributed by AV, 31-Dec-2018.)
statement:
minmar1fval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
minmar1fval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
minmar1fval.q $e |- Q = ( N minMatR1 R ) $.
minmar1fval.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
minmar1fval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
minmar1eval $p |- ( ( M e. B /\ ( K e. N /\ L e. N ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> ( I ( K ( Q ` M ) L ) J ) = if ( I = K , if ( J = L , .1. , .0. ) , ( I M J ) ) ) $.
